masthead.title: Haoyi Hardware
masthead.subtitle: We have the products you are looking for, please contact us for your inquiries.
home.paragraph1: We also customize unique products for you that comply with local laws, based on your requested material, functionality, size, budget, packaging and transportation, etc. We guarantee the authenticity and precision. We can provide consultation for your requests.
home.paragraph2: Having over thirty years of experience in the hardware industry has provided us a unique insight into current market demands. For more products details of what we carry in stock, please check out our Catalog. Our warehouse processes orders within 24 hours and you are always more than welcome to purchase at our physical location.
home.cost2: Our competitive pricing gives you the edge when building!
home.shipping2: We ship internationally anywhere in the world!
home.quality2: Our product quality is top of the line and manufactured with attention to detail.
home.support2: We are customer focused and strive to meet customer satisfaction and expectations.
about.paragraph1: Haoyi Hardware Company® is a worldwide market retailer that was established in 1988. Over thirty years of being in the hardware business with local and foreign clients, we understand your needs: quality control, on-time delivery, and efficient communication. We are here to fulfill your inquiries, please contact us via email or telephone and check out our latest product catalogue.
about.paragraph3: We speak your language and are here to help!
about.list2: Furniture & Cabinetry Screws, Self-drilling SMS, Socket Screws
about.list3: High Strength Fasteners, Automotive Fasteners, Clinch Fasteners
about.list4: Bag accessories (buckles, casting metals, Eyelets, Grommets, Handles etc.)
contact.address: 38 Dade Rd, YueXie District, Guangzhou, China 510120
faq.title: FAQ
faq.answer3: We offer 2 day shipping on everything.
